attributes.action: sack all senior management and officials at London Underground and recruit competent personnel in their place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: London Underground is on its last legs; anyone who travels on the decrepit network has experienced the constant delays and overcrowding. Nearly all Londoners have experienced the terrible service that is provided on the London Underground. This petition is to persuade the government to remove all the incompetent senior officials at London Underground and replace them through a thorough recruiting process with competent management who will be able to improve the service offered.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
